title: Adios Anna, Adios
description: Mystery! Drama! Romance! Our hero, Anna Ronalda is an orphan, raised by her grandparents. She defends the poor from the greedy bad guys.
altHero: Anna, a young Hispanic girl, punching in the desert
alt1: a masked man rides a horse outside the door of a house
alt3: Anna holds a sword, hides under a bridge as a horse goes by above
alt4: Anna holds a sword to the neck of a girl that looks just like her
